roleset.name: to subject to a penalty for an offense

example.name: autogen1
example.text: a letter from his manager putting him on probation for insubordination

example.name: autogen2
example.text: -LRB- Mr. Blodgett , who was convicted in Florida state court of selling unregistered securities and in California state court of unlawful use of the telephone to defraud and deceive , is now on probation .
example.arg: Mr. Blodgett , who was convicted in Florida state court of selling unregistered securities and in California state court of unlawful use of the telephone to defraud and deceive
